Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Levofloxacin
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Levofloxacin for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-positive staphylococci and enterococci.
Indications for Use Summary: Determines quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility, specifically for Levofloxacin, of colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive staphylococci and enterococci.
